content:
Experimentation

  • Once the problems are identified internal use and experimentation begins.

    • Hidden deployment issues appear. (I.e., the ëuí flag issue)
    • Reusable code begins to appear.
    • Corporate resource begin to be committed.
    • We are nearing the end of this phase. Several experiments are ready for ìprime timeî
